languages.text: Мы у Ведьминой порчи — места, где нам суждено погибнуть. Так сказал мне ангел Императора — глас его уже почти невозможно выносить. Он велит мне запечатлеть каждую каплю скорби. Моя хроника будет Нести Слово Его сквозь варп и вселять ужас во всякого, кто станет свидетелем нашего жуткого пути. Так говорит ангел, и мысли мои так спутаны, что мне остается лишь покориться и свидетельствовать.

traits.locale_text: Мы у Ведьминой порчи — места, где нам суждено погибнуть. Так сказал мне ангел Императора — глас его уже почти невозможно выносить. Он велит мне запечатлеть каждую каплю скорби. Моя хроника будет Нести Слово Его сквозь варп и вселять в ужас во всякого, кто станет свидетелем нашего жуткого пути. Так говорит ангел, и мысли мои так спутаны, что мне остается лишь покориться и свидетельствовать.

languages.text: We are at the Witch-Cursed World, the place where we are doomed to perish. That is what the Emperor's angel told me, his voice almost impossible to bear. It bade me record every drop of sorrow. My chronicle will Spread His Word through the warp and sow terror in all who come to know of our dire voyage. So speaks the angel, and my own thoughts are so muddled that all I can do now is submit and bear witness.
languages.original_text: Мы у Ведьминой порчи — места, где нам суждено погибнуть. Так сказал мне ангел Императора — глас его уже почти невозможно выносить. Он велит мне запечатлеть каждую каплю скорби. Моя хроника будет Нести Слово Его сквозь варп и вселять ужас во всякого, кто станет свидетелем нашего жуткого пути. Так говорит ангел, и мысли мои так спутаны, что мне остается лишь покориться и свидетельствовать.

We are at the Witch-Cursed World, the place where we are doomed to perish. That is what the Emperor's angel told me, his voice almost impossible to bear. It bade me record every drop of sorrow. My chronicle will Spread His Word through the warp and sow terror in all who come to know of our dire voyage. So speaks the angel, and my own thoughts are so muddled that all I can do now is submit and bear witness.

languages.text: Estamos en un mundo maldito por la brujería, el lugar en el que estamos condenados a morir. Eso es lo que dice el ángel del Emperador con voz casi insoportable. Me ordena que grabe cada momento de pesar. Con mi crónica, Su voz se hará oír en la disformidad y sembrará el pánico en cuantos sepan de nuestro triste viaje. Al menos, eso es lo que dice el ángel, y mis pensamientos están tan desequilibrados que solo me queda obedecer y ser testigo.
languages.original_text: We are at the Witch-Cursed World, the place where we are doomed to perish. That is what the Emperor's angel told me, his voice almost impossible to bear. It bade me record every drop of sorrow. My chronicle will Spread His Word through the warp and sow terror in all who come to know of our dire voyage. So speaks the angel, and my own thoughts are so muddled that all I can do now is submit and bear witness.

traits.locale_text: Estamos en un mundo maldito por la brujería, el lugar en el que estamos condenados a morir. Eso es lo que dice el ángel del Emperador con voz casi insoportable. Me ordena que grabe cada momento de pesar. Con mi crónica, Su voz se hará oír en la disformidad y sembrará el pánico en cuantos sepan de nuestro triste viaje. Al menos, eso es lo que dice el ángel, y mis pensamientos están tan desequilibrados que solo me queda obedecer y ser testigo.

languages.text: 我们来到了巫咒世界，这里就是我们注定丧命的地方。帝皇的天使就是这么告诉我的，他的声音几乎让人难以忍受。那个声音命令我把每一丝痛苦都记录下来。我的编纂记录将会通过亚空间来传播祂的话语，让所有知道这次旅程有多么恐怖的人战栗不已。天使就是这么对我说的，而我自己的思维已经变成了一团乱麻，我唯一能做的只有服从与见证。
languages.original_text: We are at the Witch-Cursed World, the place where we are doomed to perish. That is what the Emperor's angel told me, his voice almost impossible to bear. It bade me record every drop of sorrow. My chronicle will Spread His Word through the warp and sow terror in all who come to know of our dire voyage. So speaks the angel, and my own thoughts are so muddled that all I can do now is submit and bear witness.

traits.locale_text: 我们来到了巫咒世界，这里就是我们注定丧命的地方。帝皇的天使就是这么告诉我的，他的声音几乎让人难以忍受。那个声音命令我把每一丝痛苦都记录下来。我的编纂记录将会通过亚空间来传播祂的话语，让所有知道这次旅程有多么恐怖的人战栗不已。天使就是这么对我说的，而我自己的思维已经变成了一团乱麻，我唯一能做的只有服从与见证。

languages.text: 私達のいるウィッチカースワールドは、滅びる運命にある場所だ。皇帝の天使がそう囁いていた。その声に争うなんてほとんど不可能に近い。その声は私に悲しみの一粒まで記録しろと命じた。私の年代記は<歪み>を通して皇帝の言葉を広め、この悲惨な航海を知るすべての人に恐怖を植え付けるだろう。そう言う天使に、思考はかなり混乱していて、服従して耐えるしかできない。
languages.original_text: We are at the Witch-Cursed World, the place where we are doomed to perish. That is what the Emperor's angel told me, his voice almost impossible to bear. It bade me record every drop of sorrow. My chronicle will Spread His Word through the warp and sow terror in all who come to know of our dire voyage. So speaks the angel, and my own thoughts are so muddled that all I can do now is submit and bear witness.

traits.locale_text: 私達のいるウィッチカースワールドは、滅びる運命にある場所だ。皇帝の天使がそう囁いていた。その声に争うなんてほとんど不可能に近い。その声は私に悲しみの一粒まで記録しろと命じた。私の年代記は<歪み>を通して皇帝の言葉を広め、この悲惨な航海を知るすべての人に恐怖を植え付けるだろう。そう言う天使に、思考はかなり混乱していて、服従して耐えるしかできない。

languages.text: Wir sind in der verfluchten Welt der Hexen, dem Ort, an dem wir dem Untergang geweiht sind. Das hat mir der Engel des Kaisers gesagt, seine Stimme war kaum zu ertragen. Er befahl mir, jeden Tropfen Kummer aufzuzeichnen. Meine Chronik wird Sein Wort durch die Kette verbreiten und Schrecken in allen säen, die von unserer schrecklichen Reise erfahren. So spricht der Engel, und meine eigenen Gedanken sind so verworren, dass ich mich nur noch fügen und Zeugnis ablegen kann.
languages.original_text: We are at the Witch-Cursed World, the place where we are doomed to perish. That is what the Emperor's angel told me, his voice almost impossible to bear. It bade me record every drop of sorrow. My chronicle will Spread His Word through the warp and sow terror in all who come to know of our dire voyage. So speaks the angel, and my own thoughts are so muddled that all I can do now is submit and bear witness.

languages.text: Nous nous trouvons dans le Monde maudit par les sorcières, l'endroit dans lequel nous sommes condamnés à mourir. C'est ce que m'a dit l'ange de l'Empereur, de sa voix si difficile à supporter. Il m'a ordonné de consigner l'intégralité de nos malheurs. Ma chronique répandra Sa parole à travers le Warp et sèmera la terreur dans le cœur de tous ceux qui auront vent de notre terrible épopée. Ainsi parle l'ange, et mes propres pensées sont si confuses qu'il ne me reste d'autre choix que de me soumettre et d'observer.
languages.original_text: We are at the Witch-Cursed World, the place where we are doomed to perish. That is what the Emperor's angel told me, his voice almost impossible to bear. It bade me record every drop of sorrow. My chronicle will Spread His Word through the warp and sow terror in all who come to know of our dire voyage. So speaks the angel, and my own thoughts are so muddled that all I can do now is submit and bear witness.

traits.locale_text: Nous nous trouvons dans le Monde maudit par les sorcières, l'endroit dans lequel nous sommes condamnés à mourir. C'est ce que m'a dit l'ange de l'Empereur, de sa voix si difficile à supporter. Il m'a ordonné de consigner l'intégralité de nos malheurs. Ma chronique répandra Sa parole à travers le Warp et sèmera la terreur dans le cœur de tous ceux qui auront vent de notre terrible épopée. Ainsi parle l'ange, et mes propres pensées sont si confuses qu'il ne me reste d'autre choix que de me soumettre et d'observer.

languages.text: Cadı Lanetli Dünya'da, yok olmaya mahkûm olduğumuz yerdeyiz. İmparator'un meleği böyle söyledi. Sesi neredeyse katlanılmaz düzeyde. Bana hüznün her damlasını kaydetmemi buyurdu. Kayıtlarım, öteboyutun dört bir yanına O'nun Sözlerini Yayacak ve vahim yolculuğumuzu öğrenen herkesin yüreğine korku salacak. En azından melek öyle söylüyor. Kendi düşüncelerim öylesine bulanıklaştı ki artık tek yapabildiğim, itaat ve şahitlik etmek.
languages.original_text: We are at the Witch-Cursed World, the place where we are doomed to perish. That is what the Emperor's angel told me, his voice almost impossible to bear. It bade me record every drop of sorrow. My chronicle will Spread His Word through the warp and sow terror in all who come to know of our dire voyage. So speaks the angel, and my own thoughts are so muddled that all I can do now is submit and bear witness.

traits.locale_text: Cadı Lanetli Dünya'da, yok oluşumuzun kaçınılmaz olduğu yerdeyiz. İmparator'un meleği böyle söyledi. Sesi neredeyse katlanılamayacak düzeyde. Bana her üzüntü damlasını kaydetmemi buyurdu. Kayıtlarım, öteboyutun dört bir yanına O'nun Sözlerini Yayacak ve vahim yolculuğumuzu öğrenen herkesin yüreğine korku salacak. En azından melek öyle söylüyor. Benim kendi düşüncelerim o kadar bulanıklaştı ki artık tek yapabildiğim, itaat ve şahitlik etmek.
